title: Warning
content: There is a new upgrade to the Mac operating system OS 10.3.4 back up your preferences on all your applications before updating or go through the hell I just went through. Lost all my email addresses, websites and preferences in all my Adobe applications I use on a regular basis.
author: dan

comments.content: I updated recently with no problems.
Same as James here. Just that Exposï¿½ suddenly be mad, but find out the trouble. And now the computer can't re-connected in auto mode to the Wireless network.
Probs here. My colleague is having MAJOR trouble. I on the other hand have seemed to have escaped.
I had some trouble, and I had to reformat the hard disk. Some corruption that only evidenced itself when I did the upgrade. Thank goodness for external fire wire drives.
